name: yjs-demos
description: You can ignore this package.json. We only need it for deploying the demos to our CDN.

scripts.dist:pm-dat: cd prosemirror-dat && npm update && npm run dist
scripts.dist:cm: cd codemirror && npm i && npm run dist
scripts.dist:atlaskit: cd atlaskit && npm i && npm run dist
scripts.dist:pm: cd prosemirror && npm i && npm run dist
scripts.dist:pm-versions: cd prosemirror-versions && npm i && npm run dist
scripts.dist:quill: cd quill && npm i && npm run dist
scripts.dist:monaco: cd monaco && npm i && npm run dist
scripts.dist:tiptap: cd tiptap && npm i && npm run dist
scripts.dist-all: npm run dist:pm-dat && npm run dist:cm && npm run dist:atlaskit && npm run dist:pm && npm run dist:pm-versions && npm run dist:quill && npm run dist:monaco && npm run dist:tiptap

author: Kevin Jahns <kevin.jahns@protonmail.com
